title._content: [Edward E. Bartlett estate, East Hampton, NY]

description._content: Title: [Edward E. Bartlett estate, East Hampton, NY] Creator: Robert Yarnall Richie Date: ca. 1932-1934 Part Of: Robert Yarnall Richie Photograph Collection Place: East Hampton, New York Description: In ca. 1915, the architect firm of Hewitt & Bottomley in Amagansett, New York, designed the house for Edward E. Bartlett. Bartlett continued to reside at the house till his death at the age of 75, in 1961. Source: Old Long Island Blog, E.E. Bartlett Residence, URL: www.oldlongisland.com/2010/06/ee-bartlett-residence.html Physical Description: 1 negative: film, black and white; 12.8 x 17.8 cm. File: ag1982_0234_0355_01_southampton_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information and to view the image in high resolution, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/ryr/id/1972 View the Robert Yarnall Richie photograph collection: digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/ryr/
